articles.author: Aleksandar Gilbert
articles.description:
Crypto markets have stabilized, ending a market free-fall that erased $693B from crypto’s market capitalization from May 5 to May 12. Crypto’s market capitalization fell from $1.81T on May 5 to lows of $1.12T on May 12. The market started to rise on Friday, and now rests at $1.28T, data from CoinMarketCap shows. The crash …
  Crypto Markets Stabilize After $693B Sell-Off Read More »
articles.title: Crypto Markets Stabilize After $693B Sell-Off

articles.author: Samuel Haig
articles.description:
Norway’s central bank is embracing Ethereum’s Layer 2 for its central bank digital currency (CBDC) pilot. On May 16, Nahmii, an Ethereum L2, announced it had been tapped by Norges bank to host the sandbox for the country’s national currency, the krone. Nahmii said in a statement that it will “build, maintain, and train Norges …
  Norway’s Central Bank Taps Ethereum Layer 2 For CBDC Trial Read More »
articles.title: Norway’s Central Bank Taps Ethereum Layer 2 For CBDC Trial

articles.author: Jason Levin
articles.description: ConsenSys-backed VillageDAO will provide customer care services to other web3 projects – with the first client being Metamask.
articles.title: VillageDAO Aims To Decentralize Customer Service

articles.author: Owen Fernau
articles.description: Robinhood will launch a Web3 wallet and plans to cover gas fees for users.
articles.title: Robinhood To Launch Non-Custodial Web3 Wallet The app plans to cover users' network fees.

articles.author: Samuel Haig
articles.description: On May 16, Coinbase shared a wallet for its mobile app that lets customers access Ethereum-based dapps.
articles.title: Coinbase Rolls Out Ethereum Dapp Wallet
